content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Greetings, Ms. Wang. While discussing the rental price for my apartment in Duisburg, let me start with a higher figure than what you may expect to initiate negotiations. My proposed price is 1200 Euros per month. How does that sound to you?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for sharing the proposed price. I don't want to continue the negotiation at this moment because I need time to evaluate and compare it with other options available.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I understand your need for time, Ms. Wang. Please feel free to reach out when you're ready to resume our discussion, and we can explore the possibility of finding a mutually agreeable rental price. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
